articles.author: Bill Toulas
articles.title: LockBit ransomware exploits Citrix Bleed in attacks, 10K servers exposed - BleepingComputer
articles.description: The Lockbit ransomware attacks use publicly available exploits for the Citrix Bleed vulnerability (CVE-2023-4966) to breach the systems of large organizations, steal data, and encrypt files.
articles.content:
The Lockbit ransomware attacks use publicly available exploits for the Citrix Bleed vulnerability (CVE-2023-4966) to breach the systems of large organizations, steal data, and encrypt files.
